summary: This bill, the Competitive Bidding Relief Act, directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to adjust Medicare payments for durable medical equipment previously part of the 2021 DMEPOS competitive bidding program. It focuses on payment rates in non-competitive bidding areas, offering a transition rule and delaying the implementation of certain regulations. The bill impacts how Medicare reimburses for these items, aiming to provide relief and adjustments within the current framework.
